item.title: How to Customize Cowrie on T-Pot
item.description: Intro As you know, T-Pot is awesome low-interactive honeypot which contains many kind of honeypots and log analysis software, ELK. However, because it is implemented using Docker, the way to change the setting of each honeypots is not simple. I wanted to change cowrie’s option from “AuthRandom” to “UserDB”. So, in this post, I will show what I did to change the cowrie’s option for friends who are beginner of T-Pot like me.
